entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
